sentences.en: We think you are being overly optimistic.
sentences.cn: 我们认为你过于乐观了。

sentences.en: Employers may become overly cautious about taking on new staff.
sentences.cn: 雇主在雇用新员工的问题上可能会过于谨慎。

sentences.en: It isn't appropriate for an officer to be overly familiar with an enlisted man.
sentences.cn: 军官对入伍士兵过分随便是不合适的。
